verbose_text: Herein, paclitaxel (PTX), a popular anti-tumor chemotherapeutic drug, is used to induce the self-assembly of human serum albumin (HSA) pre-labeled with radionuclide I-131, obtaining 131 I-HSA-PTX nanoparticles for combined chemotherapy and radioisotope therapy (RIT) of cancer.
evidence: PTX), a popular anti-tumor chemotherapeutic drug, is used to induce the self-assembly of human serum albumin (HSA
